1. Stigmatize and dismiss mental health issues.
2. Support exclusive and elitist education systems.
3. Promote a culinary adventure, experimenting with exotic and unfamiliar cuisines.
4. Support isolationism and aggressive nationalism.
5. Endorse openly challenging and questioning societal norms and regulations.
6. Focus on building a personal brand on social media.
7. Always propose a clear, actionable solution or next step.
8. Value academic rigor and structured, formalized education.
